721473f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Avenue - 124th Street
721473f-a.text:
1931 Madison Ave. (left), at the N.E. corner of East 124th Street, showing the 7-story apartment house, the Avondale. The entrance is on
East 124th Street.
1930.

715310f-b.title: Manhattan: 124th Street (East) - Madison Avenue
715310f-b.text:
(1)
17-25 East 124th Street, west of and adjoining the N.W. corner of Madison Avenue. Nos. 17-19 are three-story frame houses.
July 24, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing a closer view and more of the buildings on
the right.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 74.

721474f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Avenue - 124th Street
721474f-a.text:
1V41-3 Madison Avenue, east sise, between 124th and 125th Streets: the Madison Avenue wing of Pythian Hall (formerly Madison Hall).
June 24, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.

721475f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Avenue - 124th Street
721475f-a.text:
Madison Avenue, east side, from 124th to 128th Streets.
July 19, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
